12e537e5-135f-411b-ae73-d24daf6c7b8d.description: For those new to AppsAnywhere's virtualization tools, this course covers the core features of the product and will have you virtualizing apps in no time. This introductory course is included as part of all our new customer implementations and includes the AppsAnywhere Associate certification and induction into the AppsAnywhere Community. This 2-day introductory course will show you how to Cloudify (aka package or virtualize) applications using Cloudpaging Studio.
12e537e5-135f-411b-ae73-d24daf6c7b8d.name: AppsAnywhere Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Whilst attendees do not need any prior knowledge of application packaging, they must be comfortable using virtual machines and transferring files between a virtual machine and host.
